statements.statement: SELECT DFRD_BIZ_ID ,SITE_CD ,LAST_DFRD_SEQ ,TRAN_DT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDBIZMNG_TB WHERE DFRD_BIZ_ID = ${DFRD_BIZ_ID} AND SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD}

SELECT DFRD_BIZ_ID ,DFRD_BIZ_NM ,IO_SPEC_ID ,MAX_SEL_CNT ,HEADER_FLAG ,INST_QUERY_PATH ,QUERY_PATH ,QUERY_SEQ_PATH ,QUERY_RENUM_PATH ,UPT_RENUM_PATH ,DFRD_DAT_TBL_NM FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDBIZ_TB WHERE DFRD_ID = ${DFRD_ID} AND SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD}
SELECT DFRD_PROC_ID ,DAY_CHG_CHK_FLAG FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB WHERE SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD} AND DFRD_BIZ_ID = NVL(${DFRD_BIZ_ID}, DFRD_BIZ_ID )

SELECT DFRD_PROC_ID ,DFRD_PROC_NM ,DFRD_BIZ_ID ,BLOCK_MAX_CNT ,PROC_TRAN_ID ,DAY_CHG_CHK_FLAG ,PROC_TYPE_CD ,ERR_RTRY_CNT ,ERR_RTRY_INT ,THD_STOP_WAIT_TM FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB WHERE DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD}

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB ( TRAN_DT ,DAY_CD ,INST_NO ,NODE_NO ,DFRD_PROC_ID ,DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ ,STRT_DFRD_SEQ ,END_DFRD_SEQ ,PROC_ST ,DIST_STRT_DT ,DIST_END_DT ,PROC_STRT_DT ,PROC_END_DT ,NOR_END_CNT ,ERR_END_CNT ,CFM_END_CNT ,PROC_INST_NM ,PROC_DFRD_ID ,PROC_THREAD_ID ) VALUES ( ${TRAN_DT} ,${DAY_CD} ,${INST_NO} ,${NODE_NO} ,${DFRD_PROC_ID} ,${DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ} ,${STRT_DFRD_SEQ} ,${END_DFRD_SEQ} ,${PROC_ST} ,TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') ,' ' ,' ' ,' ' ,0 ,0 ,0 ,' ' ,' ' ,' ' )

SELECT DFRD_BIZ_ID ,SITE_CD ,DFRD_BIZ_NM ,DFRD_ID ,IO_SPEC_ID ,MAX_SEL_CNT ,HEADER_FLAG ,INST_QUERY_PATH ,QUERY_PATH ,QUERY_SEQ_PATH ,QUERY_RENUM_PATH ,UPT_RENUM_PATH ,DFRD_DAT_TBL_NM FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDBIZ_TB WHERE DFRD_BIZ_ID = ${DFRD_BIZ_ID} AND SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD}

SELECT DFRD_BIZ_ID ,SITE_CD ,DFRD_BIZ_NM ,DFRD_ID ,IO_SPEC_ID ,MAX_SEL_CNT ,HEADER_FLAG ,INST_QUERY_PATH ,QUERY_PATH ,QUERY_SEQ_PATH ,QUERY_RENUM_PATH ,UPT_RENUM_PATH ,DFRD_DAT_TBL_NM FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDBIZ_TB WHERE SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD}

SELECT C.DFRD_PROC_ID AS DFRD_PROC_ID, SUM(CASE WHEN D.STAT_TY IN ( '01', '04', '05', '06', '12' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS DFRD_SVC_CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDBIZ_TB A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB B ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROCSVC_TB C ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDSVC_TB D WHERE A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = B.DFRD_BIZ_ID AND A.SITE_CD = B.SITE_CD AND A.DFRD_ID = ${DFRD_ID} AND A.SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD} AND B.DFRD_PROC_ID = C.DFRD_PROC_ID AND B.SITE_CD = C.SITE_CD AND C.DFRD_ID = D.DFRD_ID AND C.SITE_CD = D.SITE_CD GROUP BY C.DFRD_PROC_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2) AND NODE_NO = '1' AND DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ > 0 AND PROC_ST IN ('00', '01', '10', '99', '91') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2) AND NODE_NO = '2' AND DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ > 0 AND PROC_ST IN ('00', '01', '10', '99', '91') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2) AND NODE_NO = '3' AND DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ > 0 AND PROC_ST IN ('00', '01', '10', '99', '91') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2) AND NODE_NO = '4' AND DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ > 0 AND PROC_ST IN ('00', '01', '10', '99', '91') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2) AND NODE_NO = '5' AND DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ > 0 AND PROC_ST IN ('00', '01', '10', '99', '91') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2) AND NODE_NO = '6' AND DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND DFRD_BLOCK_SEQ > 0 AND PROC_ST IN ('00', '01', '10', '99', '91') ) WHERE ROWNUM < 100

SELECT 1 CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB B WHERE A.DAY_CHG_CHK_FLAG = 'Y' AND A.DFRD_PROC_ID = B.DFRD_PROC_ID AND B.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND B.DAY_CD = SUBSTR( ${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2 ) AND B.PROC_ST = '00' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT 1 CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB B WHERE 1=1 AND A.DFRD_PROC_ID = B.DFRD_PROC_ID AND B.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND B.DAY_CD = SUBSTR( ${TRAN_DT}, 7, 2 ) AND B.PROC_ST = '00' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT SUM( CNT ) CNT FROM ( SELECT 1 CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB A ,DEVON.SERL_APPLOG_LG01 B WHERE A.DAY_CHG_CHK_FLAG = 'Y' AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = B.DFRD_BIZ_ID AND B.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND B.DFRD_SEQ = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATA_TB01 B WHERE A.DAY_CHG_CHK_FLAG = 'Y' AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = B.DFRD_BIZ_ID AND B.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND B.DFRD_SEQ = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1 )
